buildItems.desc: Passive: Physical damage heals for 33% of the damage dealt.Gains a 30% maximum health shield for 5 seconds if the wearer falls below 40% maximum health.
The holder gains 50 / 75 / 100 bonus Attack Damage (including components).

Passive: When the holder first drops below 50% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains an additional 40% bonus Attack Speed.
Passive: Basic attacks and spells gain 20% increased damage (pre-mitigation), increased to 60% if the enemy has over 1800 maximum health.
The wearer's magic and true damage from abilities heal the wearer and the lowest health ally for 33% of the damage dealt.
Passive: Converts every 1% excess critical strike chance into 1% bonus critical strike damage. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: Basic attacks restore an additional 8 mana on-attack.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 30% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.
Passive: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by an attack, deal 60 / 80 / 120 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

Passive: When the holder first drops below 50% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains an additional 40% bonus Attack Speed.
Passive: Reduces the attack speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 35% for 0.5 seconds. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: The holder gains 18 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for each enemy targeting them.
At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row to the left and right gain a 300 / 350 / 400 (based on Star level) health shield for 15 seconds.

Passive: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead in a 1.5-hex line that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their maximum mana by 35% until they cast. Can only equip one of this item.

Passive: At start of combat, and every 2 seconds thereafter, applies a 8-second burn to a random enemy within 2 hexes, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration.
Passive: When the wearer basic attacks or takes damage from any source, grants 2 bonus attack damage and 2 ability power for the rest of combat, stacking up 25 times for a maximum of 50.
Passive: At the beginning of each round, the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy ability, up to 600 damage.

Passive: Dealing magic or true damage with an ability applies a burn on the enemies hit for 10 seconds, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grevious Wounds for the duration.
Passive: Every 5 seconds, the wearer radiates an aura to allies within 1 hex, healing them for 18% missing health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds.

Passive: At start of combat, and every 2 seconds thereafter, applies a 8-second burn to a random enemy within 2 hexes, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration.
Wearer regenerates 6% missing Health per second.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 30% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.
Passive: At the start of combat, Stasis banishes for 5 seconds the unit that mirrors the wielder's placement on the other side of the board. Pierces through CC immunity effects.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the wearer dies, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Summoned units can spawn Voidspawns at 25% effectiveness.
Passive: Grants the wearer 25 ability power every 5 seconds.
Passive: Basic attacks grant 6% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat. Stacks with no upper limit.
The wearer's magic and true damage from abilities heal the wearer and the lowest health ally for 33% of the damage dealt.
Passive: Enemies within 2 hexes have their magic resistance reduced by 50% (does not stack). When enemies within 2 hexes cast their ability, they are dealt 200% of their maximum mana as magic damage.
Passive: The holder's magic and true damage from abilities can critically strike.
Passive At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row to the left and right gain a 300 / 350 / 400 (based on Star level) health shield for 15 seconds.

Passive: Dealing magic or true damage with an ability applies a burn on the enemies hit for 10 seconds, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grevious Wounds for the duration
When equipped Spell Damage +50% AP.
Passive: Physical damage heals for 33% of the damage dealt.Gains a 30% maximum health shield for 5 seconds if the wearer falls below 40% maximum health.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 30 ability power for the rest of combat.
Passive: On being hit by magic or true damage from an ability, launch a fireball at the ability's caster that deals 18% of their maximum health magic damage (0.5 second cooldown).
Passive: The holder gains 18 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for each enemy targeting them.
Passive: Enemies within 2 hexes have their magic resistance reduced by 50% (does not stack). When enemies within 2 hexes cast their ability, they are dealt 200% of their maximum mana as magic damage.
Passive: Basic attacks fire an additional bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% AD physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and have infinite range.
Passive: At the start of combat, Stasis banishes for 5 seconds the unit that mirrors the wielder's placement on the other side of the board. Pierces through CC immunity effects.
Passive: Basic attacks and spells gain 20% increased damage (pre-mitigation), increased to 60% if the enemy has over 1800 maximum health.
Passive: Basic attacks grant 6% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat. Stacks with no upper limit.
Passive: Critical strike hits reduce the target's armor by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: Increases the wearer's attack range by 1 hex. Basic attacks cannot miss.
Passive: Basic attacks fire an additional bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% AD physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and have infinite range.
Passive: Every third basic attack from the wearer deals 70 magic damage to the target and 3 additional targets, while also reducing their magic resistance by 50% for 5 seconds.
Passive: When the wearer basic attacks or takes damage from any source, grants 2 bonus attack damage and 2 ability power for the rest of combat, stacking up 25 times for a maximum of 50.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the wearer dies, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Summoned units can spawn Voidspawns at 25% effectiveness.
Passive: At the beginning of each round, the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy ability, up to 600 damage.
Passive: Grants 10 bonus attack damage and 10 ability power. Basic attacks and abilities heal for 10% of the damage dealt.At the start of each round, one of these buffs is increased to 33(%).
Passive: Converts every 1% excess critical strike chance into 1% bonus critical strike damage. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: The holder's magic and true damage from abilities can critically strike.
Passive: The wearer is immune to attack damage debuffs and crowd control effects for the first 15 seconds of combat. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: At the beginning of each round, the wearer equips 2 random items that are removed at the end of the round. The quality of these items are based on player level.
Increases the unit cap by 1.
Passive: Grants the wearer 25 ability power every 5 seconds.
After each spellcast, the wearer's mana is set to 20.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 30 ability power for the rest of combat.
Passive: Reduces the attack speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 35% for 0.5 seconds. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: Grants 10 bonus attack damage and 10 ability power. Basic attacks and abilities heal for 10% of the damage dealt.At the start of each round, one of these buffs is increased to 33(%).
Passive: Every 5 seconds, the wearer radiates an aura to allies within 1 hex, healing them for 18% missing health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds.
Basic attacks restore an additional 8 mana on-attack.
Passive: Every third basic attack from the wearer deals 70 magic damage to the target and 3 additional targets, while also reducing their magic resistance by 50% for 5 seconds.
